item.title: How to write novels
item.description: At some point, every writer searches for guides and rules for writing, and there are hundreds, if not thousands, of those rules already written by various novelists. While some of them are definitely good advice, one will, at some point, find rules that are contradictory, and there are rules vehemently believed by one author while loathed by another. After reading many of these so-called rules, one has to admit that there are actually no rules.
